description: Describes the running instances for the specified Spot Fleet.

parameters.name: SpotFleetRequestId
parameters.description: The ID of the Spot Fleet request.

nested_items.name: ActiveInstances
nested_items.description: The running instances. This list is refreshed periodically and might be out of date.

nested_items.name: SpotInstanceRequestId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Spot Instance request.

nested_items.name: InstanceHealth
nested_items.description: The health status of the instance. If the status of either the instance status check or the system status check is impaired, the health status of the instance is unhealthy. Otherwise, the health status is healthy.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to include in another request to get the next page of items. This value is null when there are no more items to return.

nested_items.name: SpotFleetRequestId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Spot Fleet request.
